file_content.text: Do not speak of this.
Outsider. This knowledge is forbidden.
I assume you are some sort of Voss ghost?
Force ghosts are here, too?
I am a guardian.
Who are you to forbid me?
Don't give me orders.
Mar-Da, first dream-walker, and last.
I don't mean to intrude, but I need your help.
My apologies. [Bow]
You seek the ritual of mind-healing. It is forbidden.
I sense your disease. The cost of deception. I will not help. Forbidden.
I sense your disease. The cost of desire. I will not help. Forbidden.
I am not Voss. Your rules are not meant for me. What harm could it do?
Forbidden to Voss, you mean.
Immeasurable harm.
I discovered the ritual. I remain to protect it. The visionaries saw its threat.
What threat does the ritual pose?
What would it do?
There's been a new vision since you died. It says that outsiders will come to the planet to be healed.
Your info is out of date.
You lie.
Use this, and our enemies will take to the stars. They will prosper and return to destroy us.
If you do not teach me the ritual, I will give your enemies ships. They will rain fire on this place.
Help me or I'll destroy you.
You speak nightmares. You lie.
You will soon have a great deal of company, ghost.
Then the Voss die.
You would gamble the fate of your people on intuition?
Are you sure I'm lying?
No. Do not destroy my people.
Then we'll do this the hard way.
Fine. [Bind him]
I promise, I won't allow that to happen, but I must learn this ritual. I'm dying.
I can prevent that.
The vision's end can be avoided. We require a sign.
The lamp burns with power. Give it your strength.
I would be happy to do so.
Of course.
I don't have the strength to spare.
I'd rather not. [Bind him]
If that's what it takes to convince you.
Oh, all right.
This must never be spoken.
It was worth a try.
You win. [Bind him]
Teach me the ritual. Now.
I don't care. [Bind him]
Then you leave me no choice.
Okay, then. [Bind him]
Release me. I command you.
You should have cooperated with me in the first place.
Serves you right.
It doesn't matter. The ritual is likely impossible.
I promise to release you when you teach me the mind-healing ritual.
Your freedom for the ritual.
Let it be so. The ritual is not easy.
Tell me how to do the mind-healing ritual!
Give me what I want. Now.
You must release me.
You will teach me the ritual.
[Force Persuade] Show me.
I will teach you the ritual.
In the Dark Heart of the Nightmare Lands, there is a dream-rock. The rock turns nightmares to flesh.
Slow down. What's a dream-rock? And what does it do to nightmares?
A what? Does what?
The dream-rock is the dream-rock. There is nothing like it.
What's the Dark Heart? And the Nightmare Lands? And the dream-rock?
Where do I go?
The Nightmare Lands is the corruption. The Dark Heart is the darkest place. Where the dream-rock is.
I don't want to fight nightmares. I want to get the ghosts in my head to shut up.
You don't understand.
The nightmares are the disease. Defeat the nightmares, defeat the disease.
A Gormak must go. A Gormak must use the dream-rock.
Why do I need a Gormak? What does it do with the rock?
How does that work?
You mean those vicious warrior things that keep attacking me?
A Gormak?
Gormak seem to be everywhere. It shouldn't be hard to find one.
Sounds simple enough.
Not just any Gormak. A Gormak that walks in dreams.
The Gormak feeds the rock. The rock transforms the nightmares. The Voss kills the nightmares. The rock heals the Voss.
The Gormak walk in their dreams. This is taboo. It is still truth.
Why is it taboo for the Gormak to dream-walk?
Explain yourself.
The Gormak are the enemy. The Gormak are not Voss. The Gormak will vanish.
It seems odd that a Gormak would be needed to heal a Voss.
Very strange.
Their spirits are linked. One must heal the other. It is wrong. The Gormak are not Voss.
Where do I find a dream-walking Gormak?
I need a Gormak, then.
Difficult. The Gormak are not Voss. The Gormak should not dream-walk.
Find the Gormak. Use the rock. Defeat the nightmares. Heal the Voss.
Release me.
You've been most helpful.
You're free to go.
Not willingly.
You may yet prove useful.
I'd rather not.
Do you think I went through all that effort just to let you go? Don't be ridiculous.
You're mine now.
May the Voss crush you.
This must not be spoken. Safe journey.
Quiet. Meditate.
